website_summaries.verdict: Extremely inexpensive phone case that uses soft silicone to enhance your grip on the phone.
pros: Available as an all-clear design, or in 6 other slight color tints
Extremely thin design means it won't add much bulk to the phone
Soft material will protect the phone from scratches and dirt while providing a little bit of fall protection
Very easy to take the case off or put it on as required
cons: Will not protect against falls from a height

customer_reviews.title: Cutouts do not line up with iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this but was then highly disappointed that the cutouts didn’t align with my iPhone 8. The silent switch on the side barely cleared the cutout, and the twelve microphone holes on the bottom didn’t line up at all (holes were about 2/3 covered by the case). Not the smartest design as they could have just used two long cutouts on the bottom instead of trying to use precise holes. I would’ve included a photo but it’s impossible to take one with my only camera (phone) while the case is on! Doh...
customer_reviews.author: NYFoodie

customer_reviews.title: BEST CASE EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing! I’ll admit, for the price, I was not expecting much, but I got it and I was like WOW!! I have ordered tons of really expensive clear cases, and this one is by far the best, and it’s super cheap! I’m one of those people that drops my phone a lot! So, the fact that I’ve dropped it about 20 times; and my phone hasn’t even gotten a scratch is awesome. Now, I got a clear case so I don’t know anything about how the colors look, but I’m very satisfied with this case! Would definitely order again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case, but discolors over time.
customer_reviews.text: This case has certainly done the job in protecting my phone, but I do prefer to pair it with a sheet of tempered glass. Between the two, you get great protection for a great price! My one dislike is that over time, it does discolor. I’m on my second one because the first one started looking gross after several months. But with the price, I’m not complaining at all!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea S.

customer_reviews.title: I always like the more simple cases for my phones as I'm ...
customer_reviews.text: I always like the more simple cases for my phones as I'm pretty safe with it, so this one fit the bill right away for me. It says it was "crystal clear" but it is more green, but that's okay, because a fun detail about this case is that when you use the flashlight, the case illuminates a bit! None of my other old cases did this so I really loved this new detail. Just made it more fun for sure! I may even get another one! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: smirkbot

customer_reviews.title: Best Clear Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case so much. It is very clear and has remained so in the last two months of use. The plastic used is not too slick or too sticky so it feels great in the hand. It is also very thin and fits the iPhone 8 perfectly. The only downside is because it fits so close to the phone, if you have a magnet for a mount in the back it can actually deform the case and make it not fit perfectly. Otherwise, high quality stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Fan

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and soft however..
customer_reviews.text: The good is that its smooth & soft, unlike another clear one that had hard rough edges. It was recently purchased, so I can't speak of durability. Only minor complaint is, on my iPhone 7 it doesnt have the fit that I was expecting or I had with 2 other cases I had before this one. The Volume, power buttons and the mute pocket are no way exact fits. This frankly is a deal killer. If they were exact fit, I would give this product 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hudda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking clear protector. My wife has a new gold i phone 7 and she did not want to cover up the pretty color. Fits perfectly and makes the phone much easier to hold as it is somewhat slippery without any case. The price is very reasonable too!
customer_reviews.author: Trish B.

customer_reviews.title: Crystal clear ?
customer_reviews.text: I bought the crystal clear cover because my old clear phone case has yellowed with age, I usually keep a photo on the back of my phone inside the case. While shopping around I saw this cheap “crystal clear” phone case .... this is not what I would call clear at all, the whole case has tiny dots all over it, you can see through it but it’s more like looking through a screen door . Not what I wanted and not as listed...
customer_reviews.author: tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Shamo's Crystal Clear Shock Absorption TPU Rubber Gel Case from Amazon to replace a clear case that had discolored after 1 year of use. The Shamo case arrived in a timely manner and fit the phone well. However, it is very slippery to hold and feels more like hard plastic than rubber. It is also difficult, if not impossible, to press the on/off button on my i-phone. It may very well provide similar protection as the last one but I see it slipping out of my hands and prefer not to test the reliability in that manner. The next case I purchase will be at a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Janice J.

customer_reviews.title: Cutouts could be better
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this case. It is true to color (I have it in teal). My biggest complaint is that the speaker cutouts do not align properly. From what I can tell, sound is only very slightly affected by this. I have to listen to most things louder than I usually would, and it tends to sound a tiny bit muffled. The volume and power buttons are also a little misaligned, but this does not affect the function. I do imagine the color will fade or get dirty over time, but for less than $7, I’m not worried about replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: LaDanah

customer_reviews.title: Great buy and super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought so many of these on eBay when it was a better buy and faster shipping throughout the years. Now amazon is the way to go. I have an iPhone 8 and it was a perfect fit. The reviews saying it faded with PopSockets,stickers etc... of course it does. It’s DURABLE but still a plastic rubbery feel so because it’s sheerish naturally it will fade a bit or get small scratches but it’s what any case would. Beats any in store buy. Do buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Seana J

customer_reviews.title: a great case!”
customer_reviews.text: a really good case! my phone hasn’t cracked since buying. it scratches really easily but other than that. it’s pretty good. (the photos were taken after 2 months of using)
customer_reviews.author: evakandel

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and soothing color!
customer_reviews.text: I got the teal. I usually change my screensaver to something personal, but the default setting on my iPhone 8 is just perfect for this case. I did add a transparent finger ring to the back, for holding ease as this phone is much larger than my old iPhone SE. I didn’t want to upgrade, but had lost my iPhone, but now I’m glad I did. It’s a beautiful color!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case saved my phone!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews, but had to on this phone case. It is extremely durable and literally saved my iPhone! I accidentally left it on the hood of my sister’s car and she took off with it unknowingly. She drove off and got up to 50 mph speed in her vehicle when she saw the phone fly off and land on the street. She frantically pulled over to retrieve what she realized was my phone thinking it was going to be shattered. Well, the only damage was some small cracks on my screen protector on the lower right side. The case didn’t even endure any scratches!! So, yes, great case!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone Case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my iPhone 7. I wanted something that was thin (as the phone is already large enough) but still protective, and this checks both boxes. The case extends beyond the phone’s face, so it protects the screen in case of drops (although I haven’t “tested” it yet); I still plan on getting a screen protector, though. The color options are also a nice bonus, as I’ve heard that clear cases tend to yellow over time. For under $10, I can’t imagine a better case.
customer_reviews.author: Dono

customer_reviews.title: Fine, not great
customer_reviews.text: The flexibility is great, it fits my iphone well, and the buttons match up, but the holes on the bottom do not line up with the speakers which obstructs the sound going in and coming out. Also, the case is not completely transparent. There are tiny white dots dispersed across the inside surface, presumably to stop the "watermark" common in clear cases. However, as a result of the tiny dots, the case looks milky and isn't clear. This case is a great, cheap way to protect your phone against dropping, but it isn't clear and the speakers are obstructed. I hope this helps someone. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kai Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not “crystal clear”.
customer_reviews.text: Great normal see through case like your ordinary case, but disclaimer, only thing is it’s not crystal clear like the title and description say the case is.. has tiny dots kinda like specs all back of case, doesn’t flatter your phone, makes the color of phone look more dirty like, will be returning and purchasing from different brand who live up to their word especially when you claim something is ... and is not 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded to an iPhone 8 and bought one of these after originally having one on my 6s. There's nothing fancy about them, and if you're a frequent phone dropper, you may want something that provides a little more protection. But these cases do provide moderate protection and I like how light they are and the silicone has a good slip-free feel in your hand. You can pay way more for a fancy iPhone case, or just save yourself the money and get something simple that does the job. That would be this case.
customer_reviews.author: David Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as more expensive one
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered the same case I had previously bought at a much higher cost by mistake. So I thought if it was any good, I’d just put it in Goodwill drop off. I was pleased that it quite good & have been using it for several months now. What I like about it is how much easier it is to take off & clean my phone( it’s a clear case). My old one was difficult to remove that had to ask others to remove it & put it back on. I have dropped my phone & it has the same protection as the expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fitting case for iPhone SE (2020)
customer_reviews.text: The case fits very tight which I like much more than those loose fitting cases. I usually buy very slim cases, but this one is slightly thicker than what I prefer (but still not bulky). However, it provides good protection and looks very nice. I don't think you can find a better case at this price. I strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnyman

customer_reviews.title: Reason why you need to buy a named brand
customer_reviews.text: A case doesn’t fit properly and it is difficult press the mute button. You need press extra harder to turn on/off the phone. I don’t unde erstand why this case has been reviewed high. Will buy another case from other brand soon..
customer_reviews.author: Yun

customer_reviews.title: Great economical case
customer_reviews.text: I've had the case for a few months, and after a couple of falls, my iPhone was completely protected by the case- no scratches, dents, nothing! I definitely recommend this for those wanting a very affordable case that really does protect their iPhone 7 or 8.
customer_reviews.author: Kage.Maru

customer_reviews.title: Frying my phone
customer_reviews.text: This seems sturdy and easy to hold, but for some reason it makes my phone get super hot. Such a bummer. I have gone back and forth between an old case and this one to prove to myself that it is indeed the case and not something new with my phone. It retains heat. So, I’m not using it. I can not recommend it from my experience, although it is sturdy and durable, it seems like it would be very bad for the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 Busy Kids

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a month
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the protective case broke in a month. You know, where the case is very narrow where the holes for the power and volume buttons are? The narrow plastic just tore, making the button opening into more of a hinge that made the case loose on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: ionei

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest case I’ve ever had. I got this case totally expecting it to just be for the time being until I found another one but I will be keeping this case on my phone as long as it will last. It fits perfect and snug and although it’s just a solid color(but see through) and plain it’s still just so gorgeous. I love the color green! Thank you so much ! 💚
customer_reviews.author: Silvina Reid

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, slim size, good texture, made just right!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect on phone. Slim fit--keeps phone size small. Great texture--slides into pants pocket easy, does not slide across table easy. All holes are cut to fit perfectly over factory holes. Easy to put on and take off. Best case I've had for a phone to date. Did not impact test it--would not recommend for major impact. Did gently drop inside on commercial carpet and was fine.
customer_reviews.author: slyguy

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: At first the case felt cheap--but then i loved it. When i first put the phone in the case i did not like it. the edges did not feel smooth like my old case. My old case was an apple silicone case that literally fell apart . Because I needed a case (I had already dropped and shattered 1 iPhone ) I kept this one. Am i glad i did. After a bit of wear the case feels smooth and i can see the beauty of the phone. It's a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: prk60091

customer_reviews.title: Ideal case for iPhone SE 2020
customer_reviews.text: My red SE 2020 was slippery to hold and needed some screen and camera lens protection. All that is resolved now with my thin lightweight Shamo gel case -- enough texture to not slip from my hand, enough protection to place down on either side without fear of damage to screen or lens. Plus, it is very clear, letting the beauty of the red finish remain visible. Great inexpensive case!
customer_reviews.author: Rodavan

customer_reviews.title: Not crystal clear!
customer_reviews.text: Not crystal clear! The whole reason I bought this and it’s not totally clear. I bought two others when I bought this one ( for my kids) and theirs were a lot more clear. Theirs were tenoc brand or something like that.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K.

customer_reviews.title: Very klutz friendly!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this case for nearly a year now? And while it’s definitely getting that yellow tinge most silicone cases get, I have absolutely no other complaints. I used to always use huge bulky silicone cases thinking I need them for the protection, but I drop my phone so much with this and it’s never even had a scratch. For the price, quality, and simple design, I’d highly recommend. Once it’s too yellow to handle I’ll be buying another
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: returned it
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these since they price was right, but didn't like it and returned it. affordable cover, but the 90 degree edge on the back side is sharp and not comfortable to hold in your hand. it is not rounded smooth edge on the back side, where it is the most important part since you hold your phone in your hand and that edge is against the palm of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Faz

customer_reviews.title: Descent
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice case but the switch cutout is a little rough and it severely mutes the red of my iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Value buy if your careful with phone
customer_reviews.text: Daughter likes the colour, has survived a few minor falls with no problems and it wasn't expensive so all in all a good buy. Fits her iphone snugly without blocking anything and it does offer slightly more grip and slip resistance than before If your accident prone this may not be a good choice as its shock absorption abilities would be low.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Gooding

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE YOU PLACE THE ORDER
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case less than a year and it already turned yellow. The product description says lifetime warranty but the seller DOES NOT want to send a replacement. BUYER BEWARE! Most of the good clear cases will offer a lifetime warranty. It's better off to buy from some other sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone Case Issues
customer_reviews.text: The phone case had a nice teal color to it but however unlike the picture shown about the teal. The picture showed about the teal phone case showed that it was clearly fully teal butt when i put it on my phone the color didn't overlap with the red but instead it sort of like mixed the colors making it look purple.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Huynh

customer_reviews.title: The price is good though
customer_reviews.text: I like it. But just have something black in it. I tried to clean it but can’t be cleaned. The one on the side it’s in between the rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Lass

customer_reviews.title: Just OK - buttons don't line up perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The plastic used and tightness of the fit to the IPHONE 8 are fine but the holes for the speaker/microphone and the buttons for the volume don't line up perfectly with the phone. Obviously it is an inexpensive product but I would like more accuracy. Not sure if this will effect the volume with some holes being partially covered.
customer_reviews.author: B Smith

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Case is thin which doesn’t add much bulk to the phone. I like the clear case cause it doesn’t cover up the phone itself. Just keep in mind the clear cases eventually start to discolor. Even if you wash it and keep it clean. Eventually you will have to replace it if you want to keep the clear look. I generally replace it once a year or 2
customer_reviews.author: ToasT

customer_reviews.title: A perfect case for protecting my wife's new I Phone
customer_reviews.text: This clear plastic case provides excellent protection for the I Phone. The phone's color shows through so we can tell easily whose phone it is. Before purchasing this cover, my wife dropped her phone because it was so slippery. I already had the same cover and have loved it. Could not be better.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald P Herman

customer_reviews.title: Why argue with success?
customer_reviews.text: Fits iPhone 7 very well and does not interfere with performance. This is essentially the same product I ordered a few years back for my iPhone 5. That one is still in good condition and served me well, so I thought, Why argue with success?
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great! Makes color of phone stand out. Sleek design.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. But right after I got it, I spilled some food with turmeric on my phone, & it stained the case so bad. So I’m buying another one just like it. It makes my pretty pink back of my iPhone stand out. & it is perfect for protection with one of those protective cases on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Sol Grace

customer_reviews.title: Too slick
customer_reviews.text: Got this cover because it seemed likely the rubber gel would provide a good grip. However, it's just as slick as the phone ( way too slick). Don't really know about sturdiness. I go to some lengths not to drop or abuse my electronics, hence my concern with surfaces that enhance grip.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ivens

customer_reviews.title: Buttons too hard to access!!
customer_reviews.text: The cut-out for the sound function/switch on the side is cut poorly where the opening is too small and too low to accurately reach that switch. Also, the volume up & down buttons are really hard to use because you have to push down on them extra hard. Same goes to the lock button where you have to apply a lot of pressure just to push the button. It simply slows down the accessibility for using my own phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ran over by multiple trucks on a highway, speed limit 70 mph
customer_reviews.text: the phone didn't make it but the case barely had a scratch. went on to use this case on the insurance replacement for another 4 years
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I like how thin my phone is
customer_reviews.text: I like how thin my phone is, but worried about the slick surface. This case makes me feel much more comfortable-----I can grip it so much better. I gave 4 stars because it does add weight to the phone, and one of the holes does not line up properly. It's the one that allows you to set the phone to silent mode. Everything else lines up beautifully and it was very easy to put on. It really is crystal clear, too, which I really like. All in all, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Bode

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: This phone case is basic, simple, and exactly what I needed. It provides a bit of protection for my phone, but I'm pretty easy with electronics in general. The slight blue tint is also nice and makes it just a bit different than a boring clear case.
customer_reviews.author: AMG de Wet

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy. Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This case was bought only a few weeks ago. I dropped my phone once or twice, and it held up. My cousin was handling it today but accidentally dropped it from about 3-4 feet off the ground, and it resulted in my phone cracking. I do not recommend this for anyone who wants a protective and sturdy case. It looks ok but is very slim and flimsy. If there was an option to give 0 stars, I would pick it in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Eyad Hasan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite phone case
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cheapie phone case I’ve ever used. I’ve dropped my phone many times since I’ve gotten this And there is not a scratch on the case or my screen. The purple is absolutely beautiful. It’s very easy to put on and off and very easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT align with the iphone 7!
customer_reviews.text: The hole for the headphones is covered with plastic so you can't use your headphones unless you cut a hole in the case (not easy to do). Also, the hole for the camera and light is not align well with the camera and light on the iphone 7.
customer_reviews.author: Pam W.

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with iPhone 8..?
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't have a bad thing to say about most products I get from Amazon, but I was sorely disappointed when I put this case on my brand-new iPhone 8 and I could barely access the 'sound switch' (which mutes sound, or turns it on) because the case was 'off' by a bit and blocked my finger from being able to reach. Really sucks for me because I can't get a new case right now and I need it to protect my 'baby', lol.. Oh well, it probably would've been fine besides that. Maybe just a manufacturing error.
customer_reviews.author: Mikhaila

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really dropped my phone since getting this case, and I won't for the purpose of this review. Thus far, though, it has prevented dings and scratches. It's easy to hold and get on/off without being too lose. Not too thick, either. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Payton

customer_reviews.title: Decent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's a simple clear case, and it didn't discolor or stain over time. It lasted for about a year in good shape. My only real issue is that the case started to break at the sides. Since it's a rubber gel case, I think it's more susceptible to wear and tear, especially if you fiddle with the edges and bend the sides out too much and too often. By the end of its longevity, the phone case had a rip on each side, and dust would sneak through the cracks and slip under into the back. Not exactly the best look, so I went and purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is somewhat grippy without having all the fuzz in the world stick to it. It's able to go in my pocket without getting stuck on my pants, but also is very protective when my toddler knocks it off of something or drops it. Plus, I love that I can see my iPhone through the case! And you CANNOT beat the price point. Win-win-win!
customer_reviews.author: KandA

customer_reviews.title: Put your own pics under it to customize!
customer_reviews.text: Clear case so you can see the actual phone body. Or you can put pictures under it to customize your own case. Very sturdy. Haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: sarahxsays

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description- not clear
customer_reviews.text: This review I based on the appearance- it is not “crystal clear.” There are small white dots on the back of the case. I wanted a completely clear case. I can’t attest to the quality of the product because I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: allibumblebee

customer_reviews.title: Simple, straightforward product...
customer_reviews.text: This cover isn't fancy, isn't "military grade", and doesn't cost much. It's just a simple, soft silicone cover that gives reasonable protection to your phone without much bulk. I like the clear one, as it allows the beauty of the very expensive phone you bought to show through.
customer_reviews.author: ZipKelly

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got one for my husband too. Just what I needed. It’s snug so you have to have a fingernail to turn volume on & off. I just pop the corner for a second to do it. I have a radiation disc on the back that makes it extra snug.i love the blue color with my black phone. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Sally Snodgrass

customer_reviews.title: NOT “CRYSTAL CLEAR”
customer_reviews.text: Not “crystal clear”, has a frosted look when placed on ur phone. Should have read the reviews before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Sil B

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, feels good and adequate protection.
customer_reviews.text: The grip surface is perfect. Not sticky or slippery. It slides in or out of my pocket or purse yet steady in my hand. I use to get a heavy duty cover because I tend to occasionally drop my phone. As of now, this holder provides enough protection.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Degelmann

customer_reviews.title: nice case for my new I Phonr
customer_reviews.text: I really like this clear plastic case for my new phone I appreciate looking at the color I picked out for my new I Phone and I can see it with this case It durable and with the screen protector its just perfect Easy to keep clean and a nice soft feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: marylene

customer_reviews.title: sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was looking for. a simple, slim, sleek cover for my phone. I like that it doesn't keep a lot of smudging or fingerprints on it. easy to put on my phone. it feels good in the hand - not like it's going to slip. great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Heleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case
customer_reviews.text: Best phone case among all the kinds. It's light weight, soft to touch, and most important, it will absorb so much shock during the landing. I drop my iphone7 multiple times, on woodfloor, garage and street. My iphone still like new.
customer_reviews.author: Yuxin Chen

customer_reviews.title: Good for your phone.. and wallet
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove on my iPhone se 2020. I’ve already dropped my phone several times and yet no scratches whatsoever. Looks great as is in there’s nothing to see because that’s how I want it - it’s very clear, no decal, no color. Feels good to hold
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit good on my iPhone 8. The way it fit it kept hitting the silent slide and I would not know it until I missed several calls and texts! Had to order one that specifically fit the iPhone 8!
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty blue. I was kind of hoping that since ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty blue. I was kind of hoping that since it's see-through the blue color would make my phone look purple (I have a red iPhone), but I like the dark blue it becomes still. :) Haven't dropped it yet, but I'd assume it works well enough on that front.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit right, feels weighty and doesn’t feel like it’ll protect my phone, ended up not being able to return it, If I had lit my money on fire, it still would have been a better experience then wasting it on this case
customer_reviews.author: Everardo

customer_reviews.title: Just the style I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for this exact style of case, so I am happy with that. The color was not the soft pink shown in the photos though. It is more of a hot neon pink. I'm going to keep it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: a person

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE ORDERED THESE FOR ALL OUR PHONES. THEY ARE GREAT, YOUR PHONE DOES'NT SLIP AND I CAN TELL YOU THAT WHEN MY HUBBY DROPED HIS PHONE, THIS SAVED THEGLASS. WOULD HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: RUTH TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the case but, I took a chance. I have dropped my phone so many times. Not a crack or a scratch was left on my phone. I was really surprised and happy!! The case is really attractive. I have the purple and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Gege

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I love the color I selected, it’s very pretty and fits like a glove. I didn’t buy it for protection, just looks. Note that you have to clean it often as fingerprints are VERY visible on this case.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: Ports inaccessible
customer_reviews.text: This case is thin/light weight, which is what I was looking for. However, the holes aren't cut out properly, so the headphone jack isn't accessible, the hole for the camera overlaps the camera, and the holes on the bottom of the case for the speakers don't line up so the sound is muffled. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price Value! Sleek yet Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the price! I have ordered multiple of these! They are sleek, crystal clear, thin yet sturdy, look very chic! Highly recommend especially for the price! I have bought the clear, and also changed to the different colors as well! I have dropped my phone a few times and not had any issues or damage.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone protection
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before - they don’t break and I have dropped my phone so many times and it hasn’t broken. This is a very good case and I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted maybe 3 months before the sides started separating from the back. Shortly after the sides and tops started to yellow. Would only recommend if you're only looking for something for a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: zoden

customer_reviews.title: Simple, minimalistic
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted something simple and minimalistic at reasonable price. This does the trick. I can't count the number of times I've dropped my phone, but so far, no damage.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Fits iPhone 8 perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Fits my iPhone 8 perfectly. My new employer provided me with a new cell phone, but no protective holder. This solves the problem! Great value. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Value Appreciator

customer_reviews.title: It is good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received this & I thought it was good for the pprice. I am very hard on my phone & I was worried that it wasn't going to last. I gave it to my mom & she is still using it.
customer_reviews.author: some beach

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a comfortable glove
customer_reviews.text: Shamo's Crystal Clear Shock Absorption TPU Rubber Gel Case Fits my phone well and doesn’t feel at all loose. The edges are smooth enough to keep it comfortable while holding the phone for long periods. It has all the proper cutouts for power, speakers, and switches. The finish is not particularly tacky yet it is not so slick that your phone will slide around on a table top. I’m pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Phone saver
customer_reviews.text: Move this case. It’s simple and timeless, was easy to put in and is very snug. Has saved my phone from cracking several time a now after I dropped it. Quality made
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Just like described on website. The case is a nice blue and covers the phone while still light weight
customer_reviews.author: tkcarson

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet effective
customer_reviews.text: Great, simple look, yet strong as an ox. I have dropped my phone many times on all kinds of surfaces and nothing has happen in almost two years (knock on wood)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely brilliant except..
customer_reviews.text: Got a clear case for my red phone. The price is practically nothing. Grips better than the actual phone- should prevent falls. There is a clear lip around the screen and the camera area which allows for the phone to be put on flat surfaces without risking scratches. Will see how well it holds over time in terms of durability. You get what you paid for: The little holes at the bottom don't quite line up with the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: cnb

customer_reviews.title: The quality is so so
customer_reviews.text: The case can hold the iPhone very well, and it can protect the iPhone when the phone dropped down. The quality of the case was not good. The case had spilt after I used one month, and the clear color became yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Case was not colored as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a teal case and got a dark-ish green/blue color instead of the lighter teal pictured. The case itself isn't bad, but my phone still cracked at the top when placed in a cupholder in my car. It makes the phone less slippery and easier to hold than without a case, but that's about the only true benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. It has a little sticky feel, and is a little stiff, but it is very very sturdy and serves the purpose. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K,G

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable case
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this case to replace a similar one that was falling apart. Hopefully this one lasts longer. It looks great, came quickly, packaging was nice. Can’t beat the price. It’s a simple case that keeps the phone streamlined enough to stick in a back pocket.
customer_reviews.author: K T

customer_reviews.title: Love this type of case!
customer_reviews.text: The rubber gel cases are my favorite. They protect your phone and have some flexibility. I don't care for the hard or bulkier type cases.
customer_reviews.author: Erica E.

customer_reviews.title: The case is exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Shamo's Crystal Clear Shock Absorption TPU Rubber Gel Case is exactly what's described on Amazon. It's tough, lightweight, and it fits my iPhone 8 correctly. I have no issues, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bill McKern

customer_reviews.title: Not very protective
customer_reviews.text: Personally I love thin cases & this is just that . But it feels cheap , and doesn’t have too much protection . I personally don’t think it’s worth the 7 $ because you can get more protective cases for that much or less .
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and the feel of this case. It’s very thin, almost to thin, so don’t expect it to protect your phone to much if you drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I expected: a flexible, soft, simple and easy to change out phone cover. I ordered the clear one but it’s inexpensive enough to order in several colors. There is a small lip around the top edge for a little extra protection. I’d order again.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel & Vicky  B.

customer_reviews.title: great case :)
customer_reviews.text: i bought this phone case for the purpose of putting picture in the back because it it’s clear and it worked out very well. i have dropped my phone yet so im not sure how well it protects it but it doesn’t feel like it’s the most protective case if that’s what you are looking for. also it is flexible vs hard.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Makes buttons hard to push
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a basic case to protect the iphone and this does that but the problem is that it impedes the buttons so that you have to press really hard to get the phone to respond when in this case. So now I'm having to buy another case. In short, it's a false economy to buy the cheap one to only have to turn around and buy another one. Just pay more money for a case that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Durable & cute !
customer_reviews.text: Has been tested by my youngest daughter & it definitely held up against a drop in concrete. Cute case, recommended very much !
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stewart

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING - not a scratch on my phone since I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: This case is AMAZING. I’ve dropped my phone SO many times and not a scratch has gotten on it since I put this case on. Soft case that bends easily while still being extremely sturdy and durable. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value case. Good protection and fits my iPhone 8 perfectly. Its slim but protective and comes up the sides to protect the screen. My red phone looks great through the clear case. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ClaireA

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels good
customer_reviews.text: I got the clear one so it could match with any potential future colors, the case is just what you'd expect, it fits great, feels good in the hand. I'm a sucker for clear TPU cases and this fit my need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Good Cover
customer_reviews.text: Durability unknown-just began using it. would like grip to be surer. I do like the size as it fits my pockets easier.
customer_reviews.author: drmorrison

customer_reviews.title: good price, does it's job
customer_reviews.text: good price, does it's job. clear cases do have the issue of getting a bit discolored over time with use. but it's cheap enough to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer!

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this phone case for months and it is still as the day I bought it. The case is very durable and my phone has not been chipped or scratched while in the case( and I have dropped it many times). The case also makes it easy to change designs because it is clear. You can put pictures or stickers on the case and change it whenever you want.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

product_meta.title: Shamo's Crystal Clear Shock Absorption TPU Rubber Gel Case (Clear) Compatible with iPhone SE 2020 (2nd Generation) iPhone 8 and iPhone 7
feature_bullets: Designed for Apple iPhone SE 2020, iPhone 8 and iPhone 7
Made from high quality TPU rubber gel material.
Soft rubber material to protect your iPhone SE 2020, 8 and 7 from scratches, dirt and bumps
Precisely cut openings to allow full access to all the functions of your phone

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,962 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
